If anyone is getting in-game and/or cut scenes sound problems then I have a very simple solution. If DirectX hasn't been updated in awhile or you have missed a couple of updates then here's what you need to do: Download DirectX Web Update from here http://www.yourfilelink.com/get.php?fid=761529 - After downloading, run and the web update only installs the required updates that you are missing and doesn't change anything else. After the update is complete then you'll have sound, b/g sound, voices or whatever you didn't have in the game or/and games you didn't have before. This is from personal experience cause I download Silent Hill: Home Coming, I had cut scene voices but, no music or nothing, it was even lagging or should I say out of sync voices from cut scenes & so after searching for awhile I found out my problem. . some of my DirectX files where out of date, after installation everything was fixed. I uploaded the DirectX Web Update onto Your File Link so people wouldn't have to deal with MS but it'll help with any game having these problems. To all of you, I hope that I have been helpful to every or/and anyone so please let me know if it worked for you too. If you need more help then Ill be here to help.
